definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: With the neutralizer and use a better effect.
sentences.chinese: 与中和剂并用效果更佳。

sentences.english: Containing fingerprint neutralising agent, which prevent corrosion from finger etching.
sentences.chinese: 含指纹中和剂，能防止因指纹印汗液所做成的腐蚀。

sentences.english: Some compound neutralizers may change in property after autoclaving.
sentences.chinese: 有的复方中和剂在压力蒸汽灭菌后性能可发生变化。

sentences.english: The dosage of neutralizer is closely related to the dosage of disinfectant to be neutralized.
sentences.chinese: 中和剂用量与中和消毒剂量间有较密切的关系。

sentences.english: Conclusion: The results of modified neutralizer appraisal test fulfilled the design requirement.
sentences.chinese: 结论，改进的中和剂鉴定试验结果符合设计要求。
